title: Renewing the Covenant in Moab
summary: Deuteronomy 29 records Moses renewing the covenant with the new generation. He reminds them of God's faithfulness and warns them not to turn to other gods. The covenant applies to allâ€”present and future.

faq.question: Why is the covenant being renewed?
faq.answer: Because a new generation is about to enter the Promised Land and must personally commit to God.

faq.question: What warning is given about turning away?
faq.answer: That disaster and exile will follow those who secretly turn their hearts from the Lord.
